title: End of 2005
content:
the end of st.laurence 2005 is tommorow (wenesday 21 december) is almost here, as a result i will be away & will not return until 2006, i do not know when exactly i will be back & but i'll let you know when i'm back, in the mean time have a merry chirstmas & a safe happy new year & i will see you in 2006[quote]Quote:[hr]Woe to you Oh Earth and Sea
for the Devil sends the beast with wrath
because he knows the time is short
Let him who hath understanding
reckon the number of the beast
for it is a human number
its number is six hundred and sixty six.[hr][/quote]
